info: Only enter your Secret Key if you want to sign transactions. Without a Secret Key, you can only read.
clearSessionHint: Remove the cached secret key from the session.
mismatch: The entered secret key does not match the loaded public key.
cleared: Secret key deleted from the session
label: Enter the source secret key

remember.label: Remember the secret key for this session
remember.hint: When enabled, the key will be stored until the tab is closed and reused for further payments.
